description: Defines an array of effects to be used on items and mobs.

items.description: Each item in the array is a unique effect.

id.description: Needs to be unique across all effects in the file.

name.description: Needs to be unique across all effects in the file. Starts with a big letter, followed by camelCase. Numbers may be included to indicate factors or duration.

factors.description: Normal effects will only have 1 or 2 factors at the same time.

vulnerability.description: Multiplier for the amount of damage taken. Works for everything.

food.description: Multiplies effectiveness of consumed food by the affected player.

damage.description: Multiplier of damage dealt by the affected player.

structureDamage.description: Multiplier of structure damage dealt by the affected player.

heatRadius.description: Multiplier of heat radius of placeables placed by the affected player.

replenishProbabilityPerSecond.description: Multiplier for replenishment probability of affected resources. Higher values means faster stock regeneration.

yield.description: Additional yield for tools carried by affected players.

minYield.description: Additional yield resistance for affected resources.

heatPerSecond.description: Multiplier of heat radiated of placeables placed by the affected player.

damageFraction.description: Multiplier of damage dealt by affected mobs.

deltaPhi.description: Multiplier of possible rotation per tick for affected mobs.

turnRate.description: Multiplier of rotation speed for affected mobs.

freezingDamageTickFraction.description: Multiplier of damage when body temperature is zero for affected players.

starveDamageTickFraction.description: Multiplier of damage when satiety is zero for affected players.

freezingStarveDamageTickFraction.description: Multiplier of damage when both body temperature and satiety are zero for affected players.

satietyLossTickFraction.description: Multiplier of hunger for affected players.

healthGainTick.description: Multiplier of restored health for affected players when their satiety and body temperature are above the thresholds.

healthGainSatietyThreshold.description: Multiplier of satiety minimum to restore health for affected players. Lower values = lower threshold = earlier regeneration.

healthGainTemperatureThreshold.description: Multiplier of body temperature minimum to restore health for affected players. Lower values = lower threshold = earlier regeneration.

walkingSpeedPerTick.description: Multiplier of movement speed for affected players.

craftingSpeed.description: Multiplier of crafting speed for affected players. Higher values = faster crafting.

inventoryCap.description: Additional inventory slots for affected players. THIS CAN NOT BE REMOVED AND NEEDS TO BE PERMANENT!

maxStacks.description: Number of times this effect can be applied simultaneously to the same entity. Omitting this property means no limit to the stack size.

durationInSeconds.description: Amount of seconds this effect will be active. This is a required property for On...-Events and can not be used for While...-Events!

durationStacking.description: Defines the behavior when the same effect is applied another time to the same entity. Reset: Reset duration for all effects of same type to configured value. Add: Add duration to current duration when adding effect of same type. None: Adding an effect of the same time doesn't change the time left.

durationRemoves.description: Defines the behavior when an effect times out and has multiple stacks. All: All effects of the same type are removed. OneByOne: One effect is removed and the duration is reset
